# Move story to ready-to-refine

Execute the **refine** workflow as a **Functional Analyst**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_FA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_FA.md)

## Quick Reference

Refine a story for development:
1. Verify feature link exists
2. Check Before/After delta is clear
3. Validate ACs are testable
4. Move file from stories/backlog/ to stories/ready-to-refine/
